text: Bill Frist (born February 22, 1952) is a former Republican U.S. Senator from Tennessee. He served in the United States Senate from 1995 to 2007. Frist was born on February 22, 1952 in Nashville, Tennessee. He studied at Princeton University and at Harvard Medical School. He is married to Tracy Roberts Frist. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Majority leaders of the United States Senate Category:American physicians Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Politicians from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Princeton University alumni Category:United States senators from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Bill Frist
